title: I need a really good base Cassiopeia build to follow. Or some assistance in my build please.
body:
I normally go Dorans, Tear, (maybe another dorans if I have 1100~ish at the time) blasting wand & then complete that item with tear (sorry forgot name) so it basically looks like

Dorans --> Tear --> Dorans --> Blast Wand /Complete tear item --> base boots -->Rylais --> upgrade boots --> rabadons --> liandrys --> void

replies.body:
{{item:3040}} {{item:3027}} {{item:3089}} {{item:3157}} {{item:3135}} {{item:3020}} 

swap {{item:3027}}  for {{item:3116}} if you need kiting power.
Thanks, I thought RoA would be good but I wasn't sure if Rylai's might be the better option
{{item:3027}}  is not that good, too slow and you definitely do not need it if you already have a {{item:3040}} .

As long as you **DO NOT** build {{item:3027}} or {{item:3285}} , you should be fine. 

Usually they are not worth it, especially Luden's... that's quite trash on Cassio.


> [{quoted}](name=Wiggle Dat Butt,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=KcmsWAc9,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-06-01T02:18:47.634+0000)
> Dorans --> Tear --> Dorans --> Blast Wand /Complete tear item --> base boots -->Rylais --> upgrade boots --> rabadons --> liandrys --> void

This is fine, but you don't always need Liandry's. Only if they have tanky champions who are stacking MRes and Health. You don't always need to rush {{item:3003}} though, you can upgrade it as 2nd... depending if you are facing AP mid champ and if the enemy has another AP champ, you could rush {{item:3001}} instead ... until the rework comes.

Don't build RoA, build tear... if you build both you will delay your powerspike.

I usually like to go for the dorans and two biscuits in the beggining, I get my tear, boots, pots and some wards in the first back. Then if I'm doing well on CS or kills, I like to rush a {{item:3285}}, it's extremely good early item for cassio.

Anyway, my final build usually look like this: {{item:3003}} {{item:3258}} {{item:3089}} {{item:3135}} {{item:3285}} {{item:3116}}.

If the enemy teams has a lot of ap go for {{item:3001}}, if they have a Zed or Rengar, or any ad assasin go {{item:3157}} if you are really focused down.

I hope this helped! also upgrade your trinket!

Uh if I could suggest, get dorans then a tear, afterwards rush magic pen by getting sorcs mask and boots. After those then maybe start building a hourglass, at this point in time utility is higher favor than raw AP. Keep good cs and a nice attitude and you should be ok!
so what would a 6 item final build for you look like? Ty for input
